Game_of_Life

Game_of_Life Modules

main.main()[source]

Launches the Game of Life application.

Opens a dialog to select the initial grid size, then starts the main application window.

class core.GameGrid(rows, cols)[source]

Bases: object

Represents the logic grid for Conway’s Game of Life.

Parameters:

  • rows (int) – Number of rows in the grid.

  • cols (int) – Number of columns in the grid.

clear()[source]

Clears the grid by setting all cells to dead (0).

count_neighbors(row, col)[source]

Counts alive neighbors for a given cell, wrapping around edges.

Parameters:

  • row (int) – Row index of the cell.

  • col (int) – Column index of the cell.

Returns:

Number of live neighboring cells.

Return type:

int

load_from_file(filename)[source]

Loads grid state from a JSON file if it exists.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to load the file from.

place_pattern(pattern)[source]

Places a predefined pattern at the center of the grid.

Parameters:

pattern (list[list[int]]) – 2D list of integers (0 or 1) representing the pattern.

save_to_file(filename)[source]

Saves the current grid state to a JSON file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to save the file.

toggle(row, col)[source]

Toggles the state of a specific cell.

Parameters:

  • row (int) – Row index of the cell.

  • col (int) – Column index of the cell.

update()[source]

Advances the grid by applying Game of Life rules to each cell.

class ui.GameOfLifeApp(master, rows, cols)[source]

Bases: object

GUI application class for Conway’s Game of Life.

Parameters:

  • master (tk.Tk) – The root Tkinter window.

  • rows (int) – Initial number of rows for the grid.

  • cols (int) – Initial number of columns for the grid.

choose_color()[source]

Opens a color picker to change the color of live cells.

clear()[source]

Clears the grid and stops the simulation.

draw_grid()[source]

Draws the grid layout on the canvas.

load()[source]

Opens a file dialog to load the grid from JSON.

load_pattern(pattern, window=None)[source]

Places a predefined pattern on the grid.

Parameters:

  • pattern (list[list[int]]) – 2D pattern list (0 or 1).

  • window (tk.Toplevel or None) – Optional dialog window to destroy after loading.

load_pattern_dialog()[source]

Opens a dialog to choose and load a predefined pattern.

on_click(event)[source]

Toggles a cell’s alive/dead state on canvas click.

Parameters:

event (tk.Event) – The mouse click event.

redraw()[source]

Redraws cells on the canvas to reflect the grid state.

resize_grid()[source]

Opens a dialog to input new grid size and resizes the grid accordingly.

run()[source]

Internal loop to repeatedly update and redraw while running.

save()[source]

Opens a file dialog to save the grid to JSON.

set_rules()[source]

Opens a dialog to input new survival/birth rules (format ‘23/3’).

show_controls()[source]

Displays keyboard and mouse controls in an information dialog.

start()[source]

Starts the simulation loop.

step()[source]

Advances a single generation in the simulation.

stop()[source]

Stops the simulation loop.

toggle_run()[source]

Toggles between running and stopped simulation.

update()[source]

Updates the logical grid and redraws the canvas.
